Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Very kind owner from East Europe. He was open to explain every item he offered in the display fridge. The food taste was average to good, the price was very good for what I ordered, and last but not least, it's a great destination for …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This is such an amazing place. The owners make everything with such care & love. The food is homey, healthy, & simply delicious. Highly recommend!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Really good food, Friendly owner! I would recommend  to go here!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing. Cannot recommend a better place for veggie food that tastes amazing. Also the brownie I had was incredible. The owners were also some of the nicest people I've met here in Amsterdam. Well recommended.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This place is small and unassuming. It's not a big restaurant, more aimed at takeout, with a couple places to sit and eat. The food is showcased in a glass counter, and heated up for the customer. I was not sure what to expect based on looks, but it tasted great! The small pies were especially delicious :)

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Absolute veggie/vegan gem. Around 10 mins walk from Museum Square. Extremely delicious and all cooked on premises. There is a table for 6/8 and an amazing selection which will tempt and satisfy... 'gratin of cauliflower with truffle.. 'say no more.. highly recommended.😊😊

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: You know how you can sometimes eat something great and then forget about it? Or look at pictures of your holiday food and have no idea how it tasted (or what it was!) anymore? With Olive & Cookie each dish creates a memory you and your …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: If you want a wholesome meal like a home cooked meal from an amazing cook come here. Its no fuss take it easy delicious meal. Small non pretentious place great takeout dinner option too.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Holy s*** this place is amazing. Absolutely lekker home cooked tasting meal. If your a vegetarian this place is as good as it gets in Amsterdam. Highly highly recommended. Only downside is the space, super small so only has seating for 8 …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Veeeeery very great food! If I could I would come over every day, truly great taste! You can add multiple items on a plate and share with friends, such a fun experience with delicious food!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text:
Simply the best food I've ever paid for.
I literally just ate a meal and only came here to get a desert , and I ended up having an amazing full lunch with Two delicious deserts , just because it looked …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Home-cooked vegan food. It’s so delicious that no words can describe. The truffle gratin is a must to order.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Fantastic little cafe, friendly owners / staff,  fresh home made veggie / vegan food.  Good prices as well.  Will definitely be going back.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Top top vegetarian food! Really good dishes to a good price and very nice owners. This was special!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Delicious healthy vegetarian food, everything is so tasty ! Highly recommend it !

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Perfect food made by two of the nicest people in Amsterdam.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Honestly, the best V-restaurant I've visited. The food taste heavenly and every single bite stands out. The chef must be a magician!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazingly fresh tasty food, lovely friendly service!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Okay, first of all, if you're vegan or vegetarian and you want to have REAL homemade food and something different from the typical burgers, chips and pizzas, you MUST definitely come here. …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: In a city where real restaurants are extremely hard to find, this place is a breath of fresh air. Food is fresh and cooked on the premises and the owners are really nice.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Small, cosy restaurant with a wide variety of vegan and vegetarian dishes. The owner is incredibly friendly and explained us everything, since you choose the amount of each dish yourself and thus assemble your meal. Very tasty and fresh at an absolutely fair price point.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: We were looking for a vegetarian place after few days with too much meat... so we decided to try olive and cookie, and were super happy that we did! The seats are social (by which I mean that you have to share the table with other guests) …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This is now one of my favourite spots in the city. I'm quite annoyed at myself for having missed out on such quality food for so long, but better late than never! …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Vegetarian food done proper! Everything was incredibly tasty from the smoked cheese pie to the pea and ricotta cake, chickpeas with paprika and barley salad. Decent sized plate of food works out about nine euro. Really nice people running it too. Go.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing! The food is always delicious and fresh. The space is small, so we normally just get take away. Even as a non-vegetarian this is one of my favourite places.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Fantastic friendly service with a great selection of delicious options. There was a good range of both vegan and vegetarian dishes. Relaxed atmosphere in a sunny spot. Thoroughly recommend.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: The best vegan food we had in Amsterdam. Delicious!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Open for takeout! I took 3 vegetable dishes and two different pies home and everything was super delicious, and very affordable. Not sure why I didn’t visit this place before but I will definitely be back

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This restaurant is the reason to go to Amsterdam for a lovely day. Walking around and then bumping into this excellent place. Relaxed, slow atmosphere and very, very delicious food. …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: I cane upon Olive&Cookie by mere chance, and was astonished at the deliciousness, sweetness, and delight of the vegan/vegetarian restaurant. It takes like the home cooked meal it is (no microwaves!), and I’ve been daydreaming about the butter beans since I left. Owned by a lovely couple.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Wonderful food.  Super friendly staff.  A real find for fresh veggie and vegan food. 10 minute walk to the Van Gogh museum and in a lovely pedestrian area.  Highly recommend!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: I really loved eating from Olive and Cookie!! I stayed close by while I worked for 6 months in Amsterdam and popped in about once a week to get some supper. Everything I had from them was truly delicious! Favourites were the lasagna (bread …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This family run vegetarian cafe/take-away has very special vibes. Whatever you get will taste fantastic. Sometimes I just blind pick and so far never got disappointed. Sandra and Piter are simply great! so happy to live nearby

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: The food AND the charisma of the owner are marvellous. Definitely worth the visit.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: We had pretty high expectations having read the reviews... and we were positively surprised. Great food prepared with attention to detail. So many different tastes and textures! We had to buy more to bring home to our boys - do not miss out on this place.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Delicious, unique food and exceptional service. The owners clearly care a lot to deliver such excellent food and customer care. (And not as expensive as I was expecting!) Can't wait to go back!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: This is a very unassuming little mostly vegetarian place tucked away on a side street. There is just one large table inside but most people were getting take away when I was there. The quality of the food is incredible - far better than you …

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: The best food we found in Amsterdam! The couple who run this place really care about their ingredients and recipes and we could taste the difference. If I had to eat at one place in Amsterdam every day, this would be it.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing healthy and delicious food. Great service (the owners cook and run the restaurant) and are wonderful. Would come back any day!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing vegetarian food. Often vegan/vegetarian food can be tasteless or taste too “healthy. This was not the case here, this was the lick-the-plates-clean kind of stuff, even the kids liked it :)

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Lovely, cozy spot with delicious vegan food. The only place we went to twice on our recent trip in Amsterdam. Highly recommended!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: I loved the food here and the owners are lovely. The food is wholesome, healthy and delicious. Lots of vegan options. I highly recommend you go here!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing amd healty food. Food can run out quickly but the food is amazing and vegetarian (maybe even vegan). It would not surprise me if the chief used to work in very good kitchen previously.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Got two plates of everything and everything was delicious.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazingly good, well crafted food, calm and patient atmosphere. Very friendly host/owner. Highly tipworthy.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing food, some of the best vegetarian in Amsterdam! Try the lasagne with really rich tomato sauce. Really friendly service and cosy atmosphere

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Wonderful & full of love food! Perfect for vegans, vegetarians and all kind of people in fact... ;)

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing food and super friendly owner. Everything fresh and tasty. Hope to eat there again. Only good vibes!!!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Went back here today after 8 years. They still make the best vegetarian food I know. And heavenly chocolate cake!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Absolutely the best food in Amsterdam!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Amazing vegetarian food. Just amazing FOOD! We ate one of our favorite meals in Amsterdam here.

Review Text:

food , salad , coffe and cakes were absolutely divine.

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Very good food, the owners are super nice and welcoming. I recommend trying the chocolate cake  :)

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Lovely small, homely vegan place. Sandra is a wonderful cook you should try the orange carrot!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Extremely good food at extremely good value. Don't go if you're in a hurry! The earlier you go the wider the choice. Christiaan

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Extremely tasty food with simple ingredients and lovely hosts. I can't recommend Olive&Cookie enough!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: Really tasty, fresh & comforting food. You must try the chocolate cake!!

Name: Olive & Cookie
Review Text: The food was fantastic, and the lady working here is so nice! Definitely recommend!

Name: Olive & Cookie

Review Text: The Only one good thing in Amsterdam.

Review Text: Some places are just too good you wish people would not discover them.
